forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy this afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 60F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the evening, then overcast overnight with occasional rain. Low 11C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near an inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 59F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
